trans-unit.source: Represents the event or events to raise when a node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control is selected.

When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control is set to a value other than an empty string (""), clicking the node navigates to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> controle é definido como um valor diferente de uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), clique no nó navega para a URL especificada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set to an empty string, clicking the node causes a postback.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> estiver definida como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia, clicando nas causas de nó um postback.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property determines the events to raise on the postback.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> propriedade determina os eventos para gerar a postagem.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> event is raised.
No events are raised if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> está definida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to the None value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> propriedade não é processada para um nó com seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> valor de propriedade definida como None.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.None> enumeration to represent the event that is raised when a node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.None> enumeração para representar o evento que é gerado quando um nó é clicado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> event when a node is selected.
Raises no events when a node is selected.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged" /> event when a node is selected.
Raises both the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> events when a node is selected.
